artist: Francisco Jose de Goya y Lucientes
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of a figure bound in chains, bent over with hands clasped together; ankles bound in heavy shackles; head with shaggy beard and hair turned to the L
marks:
Inscription

publication details inscribed in pl
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until February 13, 1986; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Tan bárbara la seguridad como el delito
